backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and financial entries with access control, CRUD operations, and summary calculations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI responsiveness and mobile improvements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling login state, profile setup, navigation, and theming.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that shows a sign‑in screen when unauthenticated and renders children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and clears cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Period: Date range selector with popovers and mobile‑friendly layout for choosing report periods.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Dialog confirming entry deletion, showing entry details and triggering delete mutation.
frontend/src/components/entries/EditEntr: Dialog for editing an existing entry, handling form state, validation, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesE: Displays an empty-state card with illustration when no entries exist.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesM: Renders a mobile-friendly list of entries with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Main entries view with filtering, date range selection, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: Form for creating new expense or saving entries with validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: App header showing logo, navigation, and user greeting with login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper including header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their profile name.
React Query hook to fetch dashboard data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useEntries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch, add/update, and delete financial entries, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: React-query hooks for fetching and updating the caller’s user profile, role, and admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and state for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and responsive base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page that filters entries by date and displays summary metrics and category breakdowns.
frontend/src/pages/EntriesPage.tsx: Page showing the entry form and table for managing expenses and savings.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility for formatting numbers as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom color palette via CSS variables, extended utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing expense-tracking app requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features with versions.
